snippet: The Coast Guard said it had hoped to find the plane, which was carrying three service members, before the men’s closest relatives died.
abstract: Coast Guard says private team has located World War II rescue plane that crashed off southeast coast of Greenland 70 years ago with three service members on board.
lead_paragraph: The Coast Guard said it had hoped to find the plane, which was carrying three service members, before the men’s closest relatives died.

headline.seo: World War II Plane That Crashed in Greenland in 1942 Is Found
headline.main: Search Crew Finds World War II Plane That Crashed in Greenland
headline.print_headline: World War II Plane Found in Glacier
